mapper.insert: insert into used(num, subject, content, imageFile, price, regDate, hitCount, state, userId) values(used_seq.nextval, #{subject}, #{content}, #{imageFile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price}, sysdate, 0, 0, #{userId})
mapper.update: update used set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content}, price=#{price}, state=#{state}, imageFile=#{imageFile, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where num = #{num}
mapper.select: select u.num, u.content, u.subject, imageFile, u.state, u.price, u.hitCount, TO_CHAR(u.regDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regDate, m.town1 from used u join member m on u.userId = m.userId order by num desc
update used set hitCount = hitCount+1 where num = #{num}

select u.num, u.content, u.imageFile, u.subject, u.price, u.state, u.hitCount, to_char(u.regDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') regDate, m.nickName, m.town1, u.userId from used u left outer join(select num, count(*) from usedlike group by num) ul on u.num = ul.num join member m on u.userId = m.userId where u.num = #{num}
mapper.delete: delete from usedLike where num = #{num} and userId = #{userId}
